description:
Reid is GIRL CRAZY!
He talks a lot about them. His friends and even his mom said that they think he is compensating for being bi or gay. We talked after the shoot, and though he was still talking about girls, I told him I was with his friends and family- There is some sugar there!
Having said all that, he really enjoyed doing his solo, but the photos he did struggle with. It is one of the reasons I put him in the "confused" column. He was gung ho about watching the the pussy flicks, but it did nothing for his cock.
When this happens, I put on a video with two guys fucking a girl, my secret weapon when I feel like the guy might want to safely view two dudes together. We finally had some hard-on action!
For the end of the solo, I pulled out a Bi video where there is a girl and two guys and the guys interact quite a bit. That did the trick, though honestly, he really wasn't having to watch any video in order to nut. He got lost in his own head space, and busts out a major load. So who knows?!
Not sure he will be back for an oral video. Sometimes the guys that I think aren't quite settled in their sexuality are the most reluctant to do anything gay. Ironically, the straight guys who are confident in their sexuality find, at the very least, receiving head to be an easy decision.
So anyway, enjoy this cute guy who went all out and grew his body hair for us!
title: Reid - Solo
